1.03.name: wordpress/bibs-minimanager-reloaded-german
1.03.description:
The Plugin allows to build and manage mini blocks of HTML, Javascript, Code, iFrames etc. and then include them in posts or pages by simply by using their key in curly braces anf placing the tag into the posting. You can manage easily large blocks of code from one single admin. Existing blocks can be overwritten and the blocknames can be changed. With the help of the plugin you can bypass complications caused by WordPress WYSIWYG Editor, which destroys sometimes the code. Bibs MiniManager Reloaded German is released under the GNU General Public License (GPL) http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.txt

Language: German

More Plugins and free WordPress Themes at Blogging Inside
